column1: Little Goat Diner////Yet another restaurant in Chicago that allegedly serves incredible food...at least that's the buzz that the media creates and the followers believe.  I've been there three times (including today)
column2: and have been completely dissatisfied with my meal.  I've been a guest all three times in case you are wondering why I've returned.  Did not like the sloppy joe at all
column3: but shame on me for giving it a try.  Today I had the jerk chicken sandwich.  Nothing jerk about it
column4: way too much mayo trio going on
column5: which wilts the plantain chips.  Creativity can destroy your food
column6: this place is a classic example.  Haven't glanced at any other reviews
column7: but I'm sure the words amazing and fabulous are used throughout.  Peace.
